Question
========

In a randomized clinical trial (RCT), children with behavioral problems are randomly assigned to one of two conditions. The researchers want to know which condition produces better results in terms of the number of conflicts reported, controlling for the age of the children. Which method is best suited to answer their question? 
Answerlist
----------
* ANCOVA.
* ANOVA with one factor.
* ANOVA with two factors.
* Single-factor regression.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
